channel.title: How to create a VPN-Gateway?
channel.description:
Hello, I would like to do the same as the whonix gateway, but only with a Wireguard VPN (UDP connection), I would like to create a VM-VPN-Gateway and connect other workstations to it with Kill-Switch VPN.
Or modify the whonix Gateway to make the Wireguard VPN work with or without TOR.
Do you have any idea how I could do this? (I use virtualbox)

item.title: How to create a VPN-Gateway?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
• In theory: yes.
  • In practice: very difficult. Asking in forums will very most likely not lead to someone providing instructions how to do that.
